FAQ_Q1: What makes WorkHourly different from other time trackers?
FAQ_A1: Built specifically for service professionals with multiple clients. Track expenses per job (not per day), document work with photos, automatic overtime detection, and professional PDF invoices. Works completely offline - no server, no internet required.
FAQ_Q2: Is WorkHourly suitable for my type of work?
FAQ_A2: Perfect for nannies, handymen, tutors, cleaners, consultants, and any professional juggling multiple clients with different rates and schedules. If you work with several clients at varying hourly rates or fixed salaries, WorkHourly handles the complexity.
FAQ_Q3: Can I try Pro features before buying?
FAQ_A3: Free version is complete for one client - unlimited tracking, expenses, notes, photos. Try Pro free for two weeks to test unlimited clients, PDF invoicing, and advanced analytics. No credit card required for trial.
FAQ_Q4: How does it work without internet?
FAQ_A4: All data lives on your phone. Track time, log expenses, generate invoices with zero connectivity. Essential for basements, rural areas, anywhere service work takes you. Pro users get automatic iCloud backup.
FAQ_Q5: Can I set different pay rates for different clients?
FAQ_A5: Yes. Each client gets unique payroll settings: hourly rate, fixed salary, overtime rules, tax rates. One client pays $20/hour, another $1200/month salary, another $35/hour with weekend double-time - all calculated automatically.
FAQ_A6: Set regular and overtime rates per client. App prompts for actual end time when scheduled work finishes. Every extra minute calculated at correct overtime rate automatically. Different clients can have different overtime rules.
FAQ_Q7: Can I track expenses for each job separately?
FAQ_A7: Yes, expenses attach to individual work shifts, not days. Morning client's materials stay separate from afternoon client's costs. Add photos of receipts, descriptions - everything appears on the correct invoice.
FAQ_Q8: What happens if I forget to track my time?
FAQ_A8: Tap "Add Work" anytime to manually enter past work. Fill in client, start time, end time. App calculates hours and overtime, slots it into your timeline. Add expenses and notes to work from weeks ago.
FAQ_Q9: How accurate are the earnings calculations?
FAQ_A9: Calculates every minute precisely - no rounding, no estimates. Work 3 hours 45 minutes? That's exactly what's calculated. All math happens on your phone using tested algorithms. Every number is audit-ready.
FAQ_Q10: Can I add my company logo to invoices?
FAQ_A10: Pro includes automatic background removal, left/right positioning, color extraction from your logo. Adjust corner radius and opacity. Upload once, every PDF invoice carries your brand.
FAQ_Q11: Is my data safe with iCloud backup?
FAQ_A11: Data goes directly to your personal iCloud account. We never see it. Apple handles encryption and security. Lose your phone? Everything syncs back on new device. Completely private backup.
FAQ_Q12: Can I use colors to organize my clients?
FAQ_A12: Assign unique color per client. Colors appear consistently across Today, Schedule, Analytics, and Reports. Visual recognition is instant - your brain processes color faster than text. Essential for 3+ clients.
FAQ_A13: See which clients are most profitable, your productive days, work consistency patterns. Charts reveal trends: which days you work longest, which clients pay best. Business intelligence for smarter scheduling decisions.
FAQ_Q14: Can I track breaks during my work shifts?
FAQ_A14: Schedule breaks as part of shifts. Set default break duration per client (30-min lunch, 15-min coffee). App auto-subtracts break time from billable hours. Break time visible on every shift card.
FAQ_Q15: What if I prefer different ways of tracking time?
FAQ_A15: Schedule Mode (plan shifts, mark complete when done) or Clock In/Out Mode (real-time timer with live earnings). Either mode lets you schedule future shifts and add past work. Switch anytime in Settings - it's just your preferred interface for today's work.
FAQ_Q16: How do widgets work on my home screen?
FAQ_A16: Schedule widgets show upcoming shifts on home screen and Lock Screen. Auto-updating live countdowns ("In 3 hours" â†’ "In 2 hours"). Available in Small, Medium, and Lock Screen sizes.
FAQ_Q17: Will I lose my settings if I get a new phone?
FAQ_A17: Pro automatically backs up to iCloud: all settings, clients, rates, colors, break times, and customizations sync to new device. Sign in with Apple ID, everything restores. Free version stays on-device only.
FAQ_Q18: How do the smart reminders work?
FAQ_A18: Morning notification about today's work. Optional reminders before shifts start. All scheduled locally on your phone - works without internet, even in areas with no signal.
FAQ_Q19: How do I add photos to document my work?
FAQ_A19: On any work day, tap three dots â†’ "Add a picture" â†’ tap plus button â†’ choose "Take Photo" or "Choose from Library". Before/after shots, receipt photos, progress pics. Everything stays private on your phone.
